organizations: Los Angeles Galaxy of Major League Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham, sidelined since injuring his knee in a game Aug. 29, returned to practice yesterday with the Los Angeles Galaxy of Major League Soccer. When Beckham went out with a sprained medial collateral ligament in his right knee, it was estimated that he would miss at least six weeks, and it seemed possible that he would be unable to play for the team again this season.
